TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit PixelFormats extends System.Object
public ref class PixelFormats abstract sealed

summary.span: 表示受支持像素格式的集合。

span.span: Represents the collection of supported pixel formats.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property Bgr101010 As PixelFormat
public: static property System::Windows::Media::PixelFormat Bgr101010 { System::Windows::Media::PixelFormat get(); };

summary.span: 获取 像素格式。

span.span: Gets the pixel format.

summary.span: 是一个 sRGB 格式，每个像素32位 (BPP) 。

span.span: is a sRGB format with 32 bits per pixel (BPP).

summary.span: 每个颜色通道 (蓝色、绿色和红色) 每像素分配10位 (BPP) 。

span.span: Each color channel (blue, green, and red) is allocated 10 bits per pixel (BPP).
The pixel format.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ```

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property Bgr24 As PixelFormat
public: static property System::Windows::Media::PixelFormat Bgr24 { System::Windows::Media::PixelFormat get(); };

summary.span: 获取 像素格式。

span.span: Gets the pixel format.

summary.span: 是一个 sRGB 格式，每像素24位 (BPP) 。

span.span: is a sRGB format with 24 bits per pixel (BPP).

summary.span: 每个颜色通道 (蓝色、绿色和红色) 分别分配有8位/像素 (BPP) 。

span.span: Each color channel (blue, green, and red) is allocated 8 bits per pixel (BPP).
The pixel format.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此格式使用每个像素24位的数据 (每像素8位 (BPP) ，其中三个基本色为蓝色、绿色和红色) 。This format uses 24 bits of data per pixel (8 bits per pixel (BPP) for each of the three primary colors blue, green, and red). 这将转换为每种主要颜色256，为每个图像提供高达16000000的颜色。This translates to 256 shades of each primary color to provide up to 16 million colors for each image. 若要显示 图像，监视器和控制器必须能够显示至少32000颜色。To display images, the monitor and controller must be capable of displaying at least 32,000 colors. ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ```

public: static property System::Windows::Media::PixelFormat BlackWhite { System::Windows::Media::PixelFormat get(); };

summary.span: 获取黑白像素格式，该格式将每像素的一位数据显示为黑色或白色。

span.span: Gets the black and white pixel format which displays one bit of data per pixel as either black or white.
The pixel format Black-and-White.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ```

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property Cmyk32 As PixelFormat
public: static property System::Windows::Media::PixelFormat Cmyk32 { System::Windows::Media::PixelFormat get(); };

summary.span: 获取 像素格式，它将每个像素 (BPP) 显示32位，每个颜色通道 (青色、洋红色、黄色和黑色) 分配8位/像素 (BPP) 。

span.span: Gets the pixel format which displays 32 bits per pixel (BPP) with each color channel (cyan, magenta, yellow, and black) allocated 8 bits per pixel (BPP).
The CMYK32 pixel format.

remarks.format: ## Remarks CMYK 颜色系统通常用于纸张打印墨迹。The CMYK color system is often used in printing inks for paper. 此类型的颜色表示形式的格式为 cmyk (C%、M%、Y%、K% ) ，其中 C、M、Y 和 K 是颜色的青色、洋红色、黄色和黑色值的百分比值。This type of color representation is of the form cmyk (C%, M%, Y%, K%), where C, M, Y, and K are the percent values for the cyan, magenta, yellow, and black values of the color. ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ```

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property Default As PixelFormat
public: static property System::Windows::Media::PixelFormat Default { System::Windows::Media::PixelFormat get(); };

summary.span: 获取最适合于特定操作的像素格式。

span.span: Gets the pixel format that is best suited for the particular operation.
The best suited for the particular operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 从技术上说，它不是一种像素格式，而是一种方法，用于访问最适合特定操作的像素格式。 is technically not a pixel format but rather a way to access the pixel format best suited for a particular operation. 此格式用于特定像素格式不重要的情况。This format is used for situations where the specific pixel format is not important. ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ```

span.span: The properties are accessed.

summary.span: 此像素格式的 gamma 值为 1.0。

span.span: This format has a gamma of 1.0.
The pixel format.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ```

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property Indexed1 As PixelFormat
public: static property System::Windows::Media::PixelFormat Indexed1 { System::Windows::Media::PixelFormat get(); };

summary.span: 获取像素格式，它指定具有 2 种颜色的调色板位图。

span.span: Gets the pixel format specifying a paletted bitmap with 2 colors.

value.span: 一种像素格式，它指定具有 2 种颜色的调色板位图。

span.span: The pixel format which specifying a paletted bitmap with 2 colors.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调色板图像使用颜色表来确定图像的颜色使用情况。Paletted images use a color table which determines the color usage for the image. 图像中的每个像素都映射到表或调色板中的特定颜色。Each pixel in the image is mapped to a particular color in the table, or palette. 调色板中的每种颜色都由其索引号或值标识，其对应于表中的位置。Each color in the palette is identified by its index number, or value, which corresponds to its position in the table. 该 像素格式的表中有2种颜色。The pixel format has 2 colors available in the table. ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ```

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property Indexed2 As PixelFormat
public: static property System::Windows::Media::PixelFormat Indexed2 { System::Windows::Media::PixelFormat get(); };

summary.span: 获取像素格式，它指定具有 4 种颜色的调色板位图。

span.span: Gets the pixel format specifying a paletted bitmap with 4 colors.

value.span: 一种像素格式，它指定具有 4 种颜色的调色板位图。

span.span: The pixel format which specifying a paletted bitmap with 4 colors.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调色板图像使用颜色表来确定图像的颜色使用情况。Paletted images use a color table which determines the color usage for the image. 图像中的每个像素都映射到表或调色板中的特定颜色。Each pixel in the image is mapped to a particular color in the table, or palette. 调色板中的每种颜色都由其索引号或值标识，其对应于表中的位置。Each color in the palette is identified by its index number, or value, which corresponds to its position in the table. 该 像素格式的表中有4种可用颜色。The pixel format has 4 colors available in the table. ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调色板图像使用颜色表来确定图像的颜色使用情况。Paletted images use a color table which determines the color usage for the image. 图像中的每个像素都映射到表或调色板中的特定颜色。Each pixel in the image is mapped to a particular color in the table, or palette. 调色板中的每种颜色都由其索引号或值标识，其对应于表中的位置。Each color in the palette is identified by its index number, or value, which corresponds to its position in the table. 在 表中，像素格式具有256颜色。The pixel format has 256 colors available in the table. ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此格式使用每个像素24位的数据 (每个像素有8位，其中每个红色、绿色和蓝色) 。This format uses 24 bits of data per pixel (8 bits per pixel for each of the three primary colors red, green, and blue). 这将转换为每种主要颜色256，为每个图像提供高达16000000的颜色。This translates to 256 shades of each primary color to provide up to 16 million colors for each image. 图像与 图像相同，但颜色通道 (红、绿和蓝) 的顺序不同。An image is the same as a image, but the color channels (red, green, and blue) are in a different order. ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ```
